constraints.name: operation_limit
constraints.description: 探索操作的次数不能超过 T 次

constraints.name: connectivity
constraints.description: 图必须是连通的树形结构
constraints.formal: G is a connected tree with n nodes and n-1 edges

constraints.name: known_node_constraint
constraints.description: 每次探索操作时，选择的起始结点必须是已知的

constraints.name: distinctness
constraints.description: 每次探索操作时，选择的两个结点必须不同

constraints.name: coverage
constraints.description: 游戏的目标是通过至多 T 次探索操作，使所有结点的状态都成为已知的
constraints.formal: all nodes must be known after at most T explore calls
